That's a good question. Why *does* Shotb: That's a good question. Why *does* Shotbow have chat? Chat is not for live admin assistance, it's to help foster the wonderful Shotbow community. Ask questions, and if staff is around they will answer. You can also type `!commands` to see what other tricks I have and the information I can give you!
Hi there! My name is **Chat Bot** and I': Hi there! My name is **Chat Bot** and I'm an open-sourced Discord bot made specifically for Shotbow! You can view my code and contribute to me here: <{url}>
We do not discuss bans in the chatroom. If you are banned, please post a ban appeal — it is the fastest way to get your ban handled! <https://shotbow.net/forum/forums/banappeals/>
Help keep our games stable by reporting: Help keep our games stable by reporting bugs here: <{url}>
Looking for a group to play with on Shot: Looking for a group to play with on Shotbow? Check out some of our clans! <{url}>
Some issues, like rank or payment issues:
Some issues, like rank or payment issues, can only be fixed by contacting support through the "Contact Us" link, which can be found here: <{url}>

Please allow several days for a response.

You can connect to our TeamSpeak at `{ur: You can connect to our TeamSpeak at `{url}` (but, by personal preference, Discord is better).
Support Shotbow for free by voting for u: Support Shotbow for free by voting for us on the following sites:
